law.catch_line: Annual renewal of certificate of good standing.

text.section: A person, institution, or business entity offering a massage therapy program of instruction shall renew a certificate of good standing annually.

During the renewal process, the person, institution, or business entity shall submit to the board documentation of program updates, personnel changes, graduation rates, and licensing examination rates.

law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 112, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2010.
